==Puzzles==
===Time Tunnel===
To access the time tunnel going to Musk Reef, the [[seelie]] in the area surrounding the [[Slimes|Electro Slimes]] must be collected. This will then create a [[Wind Current]] that will allow the player to ride up to the Time Tunnel. While the time tunnel does not appear on the World Map, it will appear on the minimap upon approaching its vicinity.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|In the southeast corner of Mondstadt's surrounds lies a cape that borders with Galesong Hill.<br>Legend has it two lovers made an oath to each other here and left behind a deeply touching story. To this day the area is still known to be popular amongst young lovebirds.<br>Other than being a great vantage point for watching sunrises and sunsets, the drop in terrain makes it easy to see Windrise, which sits facing the sea.|[https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/map Exploration], Genshin Impact Official Site}}
